Reference

Get data

Functions to import and clean data

ECDC International Case Counts

French Regional Daily Case Counts

Get German daily cases by Bundeslander

Get International Linelist Data

get_interventions_data()

Import ACAPS Government Interventions dataset

Italian Regional Case Counts

get_japan_regional_cases()

Japan regional cases, daily

get_korea_regional_cases()

South Korea regional cases

get_linelist()

Get the latest compiled linelist

get_total_cases()

Get Total Cases by Country

get_uk_nhs_region_cases()

Get UK daily cases by NHS region

get_us_regional_cases()

Fetch daily COVID cases by state for United States of America

get_who_cases()

Download the most recent WHO case data

Sample from the serial interval distribution

Functions that parameterise distributions based on a mean and standard deviation

rgamma_with_mean_sd()

Mean and standard deviation parameterised gamma sampling function

rweibull_with_mean_sd()

Mean and standard deviation parameterised Weibull sampling function

Package utilities

reset_cache()

Reset Cache and Update all Local Data
